title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, October 14, 2021
description: It's the birthday of poet E.E. Cummings (1884), and for his birthday we feature the poem “All in green went my love riding.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of poet E.E. Cummings (1884), and for his birthday we feature the poem “All in green went my love riding.”
